name: ERUPTION
description: The blade heats up, unleashing a powerful eruption that deals {minDamage}-{maxDamage} damage. Has a {missChance}% chance to miss.

start: You brace yourself as the blade heats up, preparing for a devastating eruption.
The air around the blade grows hotter as you focus, ready to unleash a powerful eruption.
With heat building in the blade, you prepare for a strike that will release a fiery eruption.
The blade glows as you line up the attack, ready to unleash its fiery power.
A wave of heat surges through the blade as you prepare for the eruption to come.
hit: The blade erupts with intense force, dealing {damage} damage!
The heat bursts forth, causing {damage} damage with an explosive eruption!
The strike releases a fiery eruption, hitting for {damage} damage!
A searing eruption erupts from the blade, causing {damage} damage!
The blade's power erupts, dealing {damage} damage with overwhelming force!
crit: A critical eruption! The strike lands with intense force, causing {damage} damage!
The blade releases an explosive eruption, dealing a critical {damage} damage!
The eruption hits with immense power, causing a critical strike for {damage} damage!
A fiery eruption lands with devastating force, dealing {damage} damage!
The blade erupts with force, landing a critical hit for {damage} damage!
miss: The eruption fizzles out as your attack misses, the {enemy_name} dodging the strike!
You swing, but the eruption fails to connect, missing the {enemy_name}!
The {enemy_name} sidesteps just in time, avoiding the eruption completely!
Your strike falters, and the eruption misses its mark!
With a miscalculation, the eruption misses, and the {enemy_name} evades!
